scripts.prep: git submodule init && git submodule update && git submodule foreach git pull origin master && yarn
scripts.serve: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 hexo clean && hexo server
scripts.build: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 hexo clean && hexo generate
scripts.build-watch: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 hexo clean && hexo generate --watch
scripts.post-build: babel public/js/layout.js -o public/js/layout.js && babel public/js/api.js -o public/js/api.js
scripts.build-and-serve: yarn build-api && yarn build-vis-api && yarn serve
scripts.build-prod: export NODE_OPTIONS=--max-old-space-size=8192 yarn && yarn prep && hexo clean && ts-node build-scripts/build-api.ts && ts-node build-scripts/build-vis-api.ts && ts-node build-scripts/build-node-api.ts && yarn build && yarn post-build
